p: The leaves of P. coruscans were collected on April 2018 in the province of Zamora-Chinchipe, near town Zamora, at coordinates 04°05′00′’ S and 078°57′00′’ W. The plant was collected under permission N° 001-IC-FLO-DBAP-VS-DRLZCH-MA, emitted by the Ministry of Environment of Ecuador. The species was identified by botanist Dr. Vladimir Morocho of the Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja (UTPL) and a voucher specimen was deposited at the herbarium of UTPL with code PPN-pi-010.
